game:traitdesc-merciless: For every 1% movement speed lost, gain 3% melee damage. Also includes craftable shortsword and shield
game:traitdesc-tinkerer: Exclusive craftable devices and watches
game:traitdesc-clothier: Exclusive craftable sewing kit, clothes and temporal bandage. When crafting wearable items, have a chance to add an extra stat
game:itemdesc-spear-generic-hacking: Attack a locust for a chance to convert it into an ally. It will follow and protect you, and you can have as many as you like. Bring the wayward children home.
game:traitdesc-timed: Temporal stability lost is added to movement speed
game:traitdesc-improviser: Exclusive craftable sling and climbing tool
game:traitdesc-rogue: Able to perform a dodge by pressing [F] with a 2 second cooldown. The keybind can be rebound
